Can you explain how OPTION_NFT_TOKEN allows for multiple satoshi NFT tokens?
OPTION_NFT_TOKEN is actually set to 2048 and represents a single satoshi NFT token, which tokenizes control over the root ID. It does not enable multiple satoshi NFT tokens.

ill publish prices
OPTION_GATEWAY_NAMECONTROLLER = 1024  // when not set on a gateway, top level ID and currency registration happen on launch chain
OPTION_NFT_TOKEN = 2048        // single satoshi NFT token, tokenizes control over the root ID
```
